showcontainerloottable.desc:: Set to true to print containers loottable to chat on first open: default:false

skipMapItems.desc:: Skips map items during additional item generation, to avoid structure search lag (maps in the original chest still exist): default:true

skipExistingItems.desc:: Skips adding items already present in the loot, to avoid stacking additional items. Note that this increases the chance for modded loot aswell. default:false

moddedItemWeight.desc:: Add additional weight to modded items (e.g. 10 = 10 times more likely), making them more likely to be chosen default:3, minimum:0

debugOutput.desc:: Shows the added loot in the log if enabled: default:false
